transcript:
Hey, it's been a while
Let's meet tonight, and run away
Hey, I know it's been hard
I know this feeling, it's empty
But you like me smile, I can not lie
Such as a melody played on my mind
And you are the sun, back in the light
I can not lie, I can't stop thinking of you
Baby let's meet tonight, take my heart away
I know it's been a while, let's come far away
(la, la)
(la, la, la, la)
(la, la, la, la)
Baby let's meet tonight, take my heart away
I know it's been a while, let's come far away
(la, la)
(la, la, la, la)
(la, la, la, la)
I trust you lead us another home
We'll build a place of our own
Our destiny seems to be overdue
But I'm lucky to be under the same stars as you
(I can not lie)
I can not lie, such as a melody fade on my mind
But you're out of sight, I can not lie
I can't stop dreaming of you
(Sure, I do)
Baby let's meet tonight, take my heart away
I know it's been a while, let's come far away
(la, la)
(la, la, la, la)
(la, la, la, la)
takeaways: Bài hát thể hiện sự khao khát gặp lại một người sau một thời gian dài.
Ca từ gợi cảm giác nhớ nhung, muốn cùng người đó trốn chạy đến một nơi xa.
Bài hát pha trộn giữa sự chân thành và mơ mộng, thể hiện tình cảm sâu sắc.
